channel.title: Adding new teles to emote tab and areas for them
channel.description:
i need to create new teleso n emote tabs anyone know how to make one i need to work on making new areas also i need to know how to add a command after you have the command code where do you put it to make it work.?
Thanks The staff at jhjkscape.no-ip.biz

item.title: Adding new teles to emote tab and areas for them
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

To add a command, go into client.java and press CTRL + F to search for:

customCommand

After the last “}” you see add your command.
All you have to do now is Save>Compile>Run server.

To create a tele on your emote tab first your going to want to edit the text on the tab you want.

To do that, open TextHandler.java, press CTRL + F and search for what you currently have as the first Emote.
Just change it to like, Home or Shops, whatever you want.
Open client.java and press CTRL + F to search for:

case 168:

The code should be like:

if teleblock == true { sendMessage("You magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("Home"); }

Something like that, now just create a command of where you want this Emote tele to bring you, add it under the first customCommand That i told you about before.
And change

customCommand("Home");

With

customCommand("YourCommand");

YourCommand = YOUR command NAME

Read full topic
